body.p:
Future tasks are :
last.fm profile management.
Icecast servers support.
Management of devices such as usb-key, IPods.
For new feature, please go to "Feature Requests" section available in the sourceforge site of the project or send me an email.
Do not hesitate to contact me if you want to contribute :
New plugin developments.
Artwork creations.
Add or update translations.
